discourse_list.title: Block reward can be replaced by miner extractable value

content.content: Miner extractable value is not the problem or a danger; it is potentially the end of inflation. We can stop issuance completely if miners can make enough from MEV. Better than eradicating this revenue or expending resources to identify and quantify it generally (which may be impossible).  Recent research shows that the revenue that can be extracted from this (called “miner- extractable value ” or MEV) is potentially significantly higher than transaction fee revenue.  Quote from:    Ethereum Research – 15 Jan 20    MEV Auction: Auctioning transaction ordering rights as a solution to Miner... Special thanks to Vitalik for much of this, Phil Daian as well (& his amazing research on MEV), Barry Whitehat for also coming up with this idea, and Ben Jones for the rest!
